## Jenis teks editor

Teks editor berbasis GUI *(Graphical User Interface)* yang minimalis:

* notepadqq

Berdasarkan lingkungan desktop *(Desktop Environment)*

* gedit
* kate
* mousepad

CLI *(Command Line Interface)* editor

* helix
* neovim
* vim
